div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: Editted photo from the crow's nest of the Athletic Complex

div.p: Garretson is joining schools across the State of South Dakota in a light campaign for the class of 2020. This Thursday 4/16 (4+16 =20) at the 20th hour (8pm) at the 20th minute the lights at the Garretson Sports Complex will be turned on to show support for the class of 2020. Those interested are encouraged to drive by the football field and honk support. Please do not stop or try to come onto the field as we will still encourage everyone to practice social distancing.
Congratulations to Carter from 5D!! He won the Arbor Day Poster contest for the school and will go on to the state contest! It was a close competition! Good job to all that participated!

The Garretson Board of Education will meet at 5:45 on Monday, April 13. The meeting will be conducted using video conference technology, and will be broadcast on the District's Alliance Channel to ensure transparency for the public. Any District patrons who would like to participate in the public comments section of the agenda are invited to contact Superintendent Guy Johnson by 5:15 PM to make arrangements to address the Board.
Reminder: Elementary Material Packet Pick Up is Tomorrow (April 9th) from 8am to 6pm. If you made paper/felt hearts, please bring them :) Have Happy and Healthy Easter!

This afternoon, Governor Noem recommended that schools remain closed through the end of the year. Garretson schools will be closed, but we will continue to move forward with our Distance Learning plans to finish the year strong. Be watching for updated plans from your principal.
What a beautiful happy Friday we have, with nice weather in the works. This week's Blue Ink features a few 50th Anniversary features including Earth Day and the Apollo 13......
Even though we aren't in school, the Blue Ink journalists are still finding ways to get you all news of what's going on in and out of Garretson. There are updates......
Another edition of the Blue Ink is out and ready for you. It features students' take on their online learning experiences, as well as coronavirus updates (SD statistics,......
